I wouldn't say this is the best place in town, but by all means go here.  It's right in the center of tourist central, close to La Boqueria.  This was our first real meal in Barcelona and the picture menu and bar were calling out to my starving tummy.  Normally I wouldn't choose a place with picture menus, but it turned out to be okay.  The pork tapas with bacon were better than some of the others on display from what I remember.  We had others with seafood but they weren't as memorable.We actually ate here twice on our short trip because the food was decent, but more importantly, it's dirt cheap.  The service isn't great by any means, but the price was so worth it.  I stuffed my face here.  To make your visit more worthy, order a Clara - Fanta and beer.  It's so good you won't regret it.
